General.Name: Zhejiang Kan Specialities Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Kan Specialities Material Co., Ltd. produces and sells special long fiber and electrical papers. The company offers electrolytic capacitors, non-heat and heat sealed tea filters, cigarette tipping base papers, paper series for tapes, and vacuum cleaner bag papers. Zhejiang Kan Specialities Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1940 and is based in Lishui, China.

5.Name: Mr. Zhao Yu  Yang
5.Title: Sec. of the Board, VP & Non-Independent Director
